topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: Secondary Channel Protection System-mIRC
short_description: A system of modular mIRC scripts, designed to improve security, moderation, and administration of IRC channels. SCPS will include features such as automated moderation tools, simple commands to perform complex actions (Such as timed bans, kicking/banning multiple users), and channel-specific login details independent of IRC services.
